channel.title: Font changed in Tor Browser Bundle
channel.description:
Who else notices a UI font changed in Tor Browser Bundle when upgraded to version 5.5?
The font seems to change only in Whonix but not my Window's TBB (also version 5.5). Not sure about other Unix distro, though. Just curious.

item.title: Font changed in Tor Browser Bundle
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The difference is more likely Windows vs Debian. Which then would
include Whonix, because it’s based on Debian. As per:

Whonix

Support

Various Ways to get Help with Whonix. Free and Professional Support available.

A change related to fonts is mentioned in the TBB changelog:
https://blog.torproject.org/blog/tor-browser-55-released

Read full topic
item.source: Font changed in Tor Browser Bundle
